Description:
Spacious family lifestyle with an entertaining edge
In a prestigious Croydon Hills position, located between Narr-Maen and Settlers Orchard Reserves, this brick veneer house will appeal to families and entertainers, featuring 3 bedrooms, 2 living areas and an impressive alfresco entertaining zone on a 693 sq m approx. corner allotment.
At the front of the single-level house, the formal lounge and dining rooms feature vaulted ceilings and an open fireplace, accessing the covered alfresco entertaining zone with a BBQ and gas-heated spa.
Illuminated by a skylight, the central kitchen adjoins a family room and is equipped with Fisher & Paykel cooking appliances and a Bosch dishwasher.
Positioned for parental privacy, the master bedroom features a walk-in wardrobe, an ensuite with a double shower and access to the spa area. In a separate wing, another 2 bedrooms with built-in wardrobes share a separate toilet and a sky-lit family bathroom.
Further inclusions: ducted heating, an air-conditioner and reverse cycle split system, ceiling fans and a double carport with an automatic door and internal access.
Stroll through parklands on your daily walk and enjoy the nearby convenience of McAdam Square and sought-after schools, including Yarra Valley Grammar, Luther College, Good Shepherd and Croydon Hills Primary Schools and Rudolf Steiner School.
- 2 living areas
- Vaulted ceilings
- Brilliant entertainer's backyard
- Heated spa
- Nearby reserves and schools

Strong Family Focus
SALE BY FIXED DATE Tues 3rd May 5pm
Light, bright and offering a strong family focus, this delightful home features flexible living spaces and a separately zoned bedroom wing for additional privacy and a relaxed and laid-back family lifestyle.
Accommodation begins with a warm and inviting L-shaped living and dining room ideal for year round use, while at the heart of the home is a light-filled kitchen featuring stainless steel appliances including an AEG self-cleaning wall oven, cooktop and built-in microwave oven and Bosch dishwasher. Glass sliding doors seamlessly connect the adjoining family room with an entertaining area covered with a Stratco Cooldek insulated roof for easy entertaining in the private and secure, landscaped garden. The space is fully insulated and further enhanced by modern polished concrete floors.
Back inside and the main bedroom features an ensuite, WIR and further access to the garden, while two additional bedrooms (BIRs) are serviced by a central bathroom, separate toilet and family-sized laundry. And completing the accommodation is a good sized study/additional bedroom which conveniently adjoins the family room.
Centrally located within walking distance of Croydon Hills Primary School and Luther College and just moments from other quality schools including Yarra Road Primary, Good Shepherd Primary and Yarra Valley Grammar makes this fabulous property highly desirable for families. Access to nearby McAdam Square, bus services, Eastland, Eastlink and Chirnside Park Shopping Centre further adds to the appeal. Additional bonus features include GDH, 3 x split-system air-conditioners, garden shed, tandem carport and parking for a boat or trailer.
